definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Lower the value-added tax and business tax threshold for small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 提高小型微型企業增值稅和營業稅起徵點。

sentences.english: Macau's 17 casinos pay a 35% tax on their gross profits.
sentences.chinese: 澳門的17個賭場需要上繳總利潤35%的營業稅。

sentences.english: New legislation has raised taxes on people's incomes and on business.
sentences.chinese: 新法律提高了個人所得稅和營業稅。

sentences.english: only on the last case, the transfer of equity is exempt from tax.
sentences.chinese: 對後一種情況，在轉讓股權時應免繳營業稅。

sentences.english: he had accidently put his name on the sales-tax form.
sentences.chinese: 他是不小心將名字留在了營業稅單上的。

sentences.english: The business tax will be exempted if the foreign invested companies gain the income from their tech transfer.
sentences.chinese: 外商投資企業取得的技術轉讓收入免徵營業稅。

sentences.english: Only in the last case, the transfer of equity is exempt from taxation.
sentences.chinese: 對後一種情況，在轉讓股權時應免繳營業稅。

sentences.english: B: May I ask how to compute the Business Tax payable?
sentences.chinese: 請問如何計算營業稅應納稅額？

sentences.english: Thus, compared with business tax, enterprise income tax has the advantage of neutral nature.
sentences.chinese: 因此，與營業稅相比，所得稅具有中性稅收的優點。

sentences.english: Introducing the house keeping company to decrease business tax items.
sentences.chinese: 物業公司提前介入，減少營業稅應稅項目等。

sentences.english: When purchasing invoice for the first time, you need to fill out "Assessment Form on Sales Tax Invoice Application".
sentences.chinese: 初次購領發票，請填寫《營業稅發票使用鑑定表》。

definition: to reduce payment/to annul (debts, bills, taxes etc)/to let sb off paying
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
